message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the opportunity, I'm looking to spend a bit less. How about $105?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking to save some money, but I have to prioritize my own needs. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at $108?
